item.title: docker基础
item.author: 明里
item.description: 1. docker安装 ubuntu中安装docker 1. 卸载旧版本 1 sudo apt-get remove docker docker-engine docker.io containerd runc 2. 安装依赖 1 2 3 4 5 6 sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install \ ca-certificates \ curl \ gnupg \ lsb-release 3. 添加doc
